ticket.title: Submit ticket
ticket.description: Describe your issue and our support team will reply via email as soon as possible.
ticket.feedbackDescription: Logs are being uploaded. Please describe your issue. The logs will help us locate the problem faster.
ticket.contentPlaceholder: Please describe your issue in detail, including steps, error messages, etc. This will help us resolve it faster.
ticket.submitFailed: Ticket submission failed, please try again later
ticket.emailReplyHint: Our support team will communicate with you via email. Please check your inbox for replies.
ticket.howItWorksDescription: After submission, the system will send the ticket to our support email and CC a copy to your registered email. Follow-up communication will be via email, so please ensure you can receive email notifications.
ticket.entryDescription: Having issues? Submit a ticket and we'll reply soon

issues.entryDescription: View questions from other users and official replies
issues.emptyHint: No issues have been submitted yet
issues.error: Failed to load, please try again
